DoktorSnake

Independent operator. Strategic perception. Applied influence.

Clarity. Leverage. Movement.

I work with people navigating real stakes — relationships, money, work, power dynamics, turning points. The tools vary: psychological, strategic, sometimes symbolic. The aim is always the same:

Change the trajectory.

About

Doktor Snake is the working identity of Jimmy Lee Shreeve — author and former journalist published in The Independent, Daily Telegraph, Sunday Telegraph, and Financial Times.
